data.text:
@GigiSims10 It seems to me that those who scream about this whole charade DO not understand that this whole "CON"-flict is orchestrated as part of Agenda 2030. It's ALL about DESTROYING the current 'old' world order to be replaced by the "new" order.

#DestroytTheOldToBuildBackBetter #Davos

@GigiSims10 Vice PM of Ukraine, Mykhailo Fedorov, connected to WEF.  Listing amounts given to support Ukraine, but wants to hurt Russians: Visa/Mastercard to pull out of Russia, block accounts on social media, apple pay and google play. A war using corporations. Are we next?

@tobeycakes @ringliberty @GigiSims10 Iâ€™ve been on a road trip, and been listening to the book IBM and the Holocaust.  The efficiency and magnitude of isolating Jews and killing them was not possible without the monopolistic corporation.

@ringliberty @GigiSims10 With each of these major events, CovID or Ukraine, big data is able to collect more and more information .. they divide the world up into segments and then divide the segments into more segments.. Agenda 2030 is a population reduction program with AI automating the process.

@GigiSims10 The fact that Western leaders haven't care about the loss of liberty and rights  of their own citizens demonstrates that Ukraine's struggle has been heavily politicized by the West. Why? And to what end?
